item.title: new test post
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Project Implicit)
item.description: Individual Task Results: Age Individual Task Results: Age Total N = 3203 Participation per year (N): Evaluation measures Note: Higher values indicate stronger bias in favor of the dominant category (young people). IAT: There is a strong bias in favor of Young people Self-reported preference between the categories: There is a strong bias in favor of Young people Self-reported feeling thermometer (difference score): There is a small bias in favor of Young people.
